other_tests.findings: Negative for common allergens. Positive for latex extract.
Showed several bands from 15 to 60 kDa; IgE-immunoblotting revealed a single band of around 30 kDa.
Revealed a strong band of around 30 kDa in the chestnut chitinase recombinant.
Induced a 15% fall in FEV1 at 1 hour, with a 20% decrease at 4 hours.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Repeat challenge one week later showed similar findings.

other_tests.findings: Significant increase in lymphocytes and neutrophil proportion, especially at 18 hours after the challenge.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Eosinophil influx increased to 4%, with a more than two-fold increase in the permeability index (from 8.0% before to 18.2%).
